text: If a provision of this subchapter or its application to a person or circumstance is held invalid, the invalidity shall not affect other provisions or applications of this subchapter which can be given effect without the invalid provisions or application.
historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90-day) addition of section, see notes following § 7-1831.01.

For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see §§ 3702 to 3707 of the Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-438, October 20, 2000, 47 DCR 8740).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 13-172, see notes following § 7-1811.01.

DC CODE § 7-1831.05

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

subtitle.text: Tobacco Smoking, Sales, Distribution, Regulation, and Settlement.
